author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Synnex Corp Amended Accounts Receivable Securitization Program By Entering Into Eighth Omnibus Amendment
text:
May 11 (Reuters) - SYNNEX Corp:
* SYNNEX CORP SAYS ON MAY 7, CO, UNIT AMENDED CO’ ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE SECURITIZATION PROGRAM BY ENTERING INTO EIGHTH OMNIBUS AMENDMENT - SEC FILING
* SYNNEX CORP - SECURITIZATION AMENDMENT INCREASES LENDING COMMITMENT OF LENDERS TO SIT BY $250 MILLION, TO $850 MILLION
* SYNNEX - AMENDMENT INCREASES SIZE OF ACCORDION FEATURE UNDER WHICH SIT MAY REQUEST AN INCREASE IN LENDERS’ COMMITMENT TO $150 MILLION
* SYNNEX CORP - SECURITIZATION AMENDMENT EXTENDS MATURITY DATE OF TRADE RECEIVABLES SECURITIZATION TO MAY 7, 2020 Source text: ( bit.ly/2Ic1Jx7 ) Further company coverage:
